Details.Name: sc_card_name
Details.Feature: Citibank Rewards Visa Card

Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Earn 10 Rewards points or 4 miles for every S$1 spent on clothes, bags or shoes or at department stores or online shopping websites. Valid for local or overseas. Earn 1 Reward point for for every other S$1 spend on all other spend.
Up to 30% off Online Shopping at Luxola, Blue Nile, HipVan, ZALORA and more.
Complimentary S$1500 worth of shopping vouchers from your favourite brands that include Luxola, ZALORA, Evisu, Reebonz, Rakuten, Klareti & many more.

Details.Name: sc_promotion_details
Details.Feature: S$80 Takashimaya Voucher

Details.Name: sc_promotion_cond
Details.Feature: Charge at least S$1000 to the card within 60 days of card approval. Promotion is valid till 15 May 2016.

Details.Name: sc_gift_details
Details.Feature: 1. S$50 Qoo10 Gift Card
2. Spend a minimum of S$80 every Friday during the promotion period and get S$10 off your total purchase.
3. Get 20X* Rewards on your total purchase every day during the promotion period.

Details.Name: sc_gift_cond
Details.Feature: 1. Spend of at least S$50 at Qoo10.sg within 30 days after card approval.
2. Promotion Period: 4 March 2016 to 30 April 2016

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Fee Waiver

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: Online Shopping merchants include all shopping websites and EXCLUDE all (but not limited to) food & beverage, travel, airline, government, brokerage/ securities, cinema, insurance, tuition and online gambling websites.
Rewards Points refer to the Citi Dollars earned on the Credit Card account.
10X Rewards capped at maximum of 120,000 Rewards Points per card anniversary year. No cap for 1X Rewards.

Details.Name: sc_cashback_details
Details.Feature: Up to 10% additional rebate at over 700 merchant outlets including Burger King, Cold Storage, Shell and Starbucks with Citi Rebate

Details.Name: sc_dining_details
Details.Feature: 1-for-1 drinks at Zouk Wine Bar and Velvet Underground
Exclusive dining deals with Citi Gourmet Pleasures at top restaurants such as Kuro Restaurant & Bar, Skyve Wine Bistro and more
Up to 10% rebate at over 700 merchant outlets including Burger King, Cold Storage, Shell and Starbucks.

Details.Name: sc_entertainment_details
Details.Feature: S$1 = 10 Rewards Points on online spend
Enjoy free entry and 1-for-1 drinks at Zouk

Details.Name: sc_grocery_details
Details.Feature: Earn up to 2% Citi Rebate at Cold Storage, Giant, Sheng Siong, and many more (for transactions of S$50 and above)
1% Citi Rebate is awarded for transactions of S$20 to less than S$50
S$1 = 1 Citi$

Details.Name: sc_petrol_details
Details.Feature: 14% discount at Esso stations - 5% Esso site discount + 5% Smiles card discount + 4% Citicard discount
13.6% discount at Shell stations - 5% Shell site discount + 5% Shell Escape discount + 4% Citi Rebate (applies after Shell discount)
S$1 = 1 Citi$

Details.Name: sc_rewards_details
Details.Feature: Get 10 Rewards points (or 4 Miles) for every S$1 spent on Shoes + Bags + Clothes, Departmental Stores (local or overseas) or Online Shopping websites*
*Excludes all (but not limited to) food & beverage, travel, airline, government, brokerage/ securities, cinema, insurance, tuition and online gambling websites
Up to 10% rebate at over 700 merchant outlets including Burger King, Cold Storage, Shell and Starbucks
$1 on all other spend = 1 Citi$
Redeem your Rewards Points on either Miles, Shopping or Dining Vouchers or Cash Rebate

Details.Name: sc_shopping_details
Details.Feature: Get 10 Rewards points (or 4 Miles) for every S$1 spent on Shoes + Bags + Clothes, Departmental Stores (local or overseas) or Online Shopping websites*
*Excludes all (but not limited to) food & beverage, travel, airline, government, brokerage/ securities, cinema, insurance, tuition and online gambling websites
$1 on all other spend = 1 Citi$
Up to 10% rebate at over 700 merchant outlets including Burger King, Cold Storage, Shell and Starbucks
Get up to 30% off Online Shopping at Luxola, Blue Nile, Reebonz and more
